website_summaries.verdict: Wearers claim this bralette from the ever-popular CK line is their official everyday bra.
pros: Triangular neckline means you can wear a variety of collars without revealing the bralette
Lined just enough to provide some modesty without feeling bulky or like a push-up bra
cons: Bottom band has a tendency to roll up, and some wearers say the padding is noticeable through shirts

customer_reviews.title: Great casual, comfy bra
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bra to be a comfy t-shirt bra and it’s exactly that. The material is very soft and smooth. I forget that I’m wearing it during the day! I’ve worn this for a few days now, and I’m very happy with the purchase. Would recommend! For photo and sizing context: I am 5’4, 145lbs, 34C
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Rolls Up
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this bra. The fabric is great and overall it was comfortable (aside from the giant tags I had to cut out). However, after wearing it for a day, the bottom of it was constantly rolling up. It was pretty annoying. Maybe after wearing it for a while, it will work itself out but in the meantime, it's a bummer having to constantly adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Currently throwing out all my other bras
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this bra in several colors now and thrown out all my others. Im sensitive to materials and tight things so this has made a substantial improvement in my daily undergarment life. I’m a 36B and medium fits perfectly. I’ve tried bralettes in the last and they don’t offer enough support but this one works.
customer_reviews.author: IveGotSomethingToSay

customer_reviews.title: I had to return it but great fabric and design
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the design and fabric on this bra.it is soft, thin and covers bra fat. the only problem that made me return this item was the nipp** showing thru the cloth bc bra fabric is so thin
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but needs to be tagless!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that this is the most flattering bralette, but it has more to do with me than the product. It's very comfortable, but the tag!!!! If you leave it, it's uncomfortable, and if you cut it, it will rub your skin and irritate you. I finally got it cut very close to the seam without destroying the seam. It will just have to do. I hope that in the future, they make them without tags that can't be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Jooleepadoolie

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY comfortable, just not pretty to look at. Boobs don't look great either. Lol.
customer_reviews.text: This bra feels like you're not even wearing it. I was aiming to find a bra that gives me lift and is also flattering, which I have found in some other non-underwire bras, but they aren't as comfortable. I wear a 38DD and ordered an XL. It fits great and feels great but gave it two stars for flattering. Although extremely comfortable and breathable, not very lifting, and definitely look like a granny-bra. Because of the comfort though, I decided not to return it. I'll make it my t-shirt or hiking bra.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Q.

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable bra I own now!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is INSANELY comfortable! I’ve been hunting for a comfy bra and this delivers. Also has a seamless design, except for the straps. The only things is if you tend to poke out more when it’s cold, you will want to double up the cup pads like I did. These pics are from after I added padding from a bralette I own. Normally a 34D in Victoria’s Secret, got a M. Fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Just a reviewer

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFFS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate ordering off amazon because sometimes you will get some bootlegged items. Upon opening my package I was immediately disappointed with this product. It was POORLY made. Stitches were terrible, the tags were cheap the back tag was in Korean. This is NOT the real deal. You are buying a KNOCK OFF for the price of a real one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Truong

customer_reviews.title: Like butter! I’m obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I have implants so I don’t like wire or lined bars anymore. This bar is so comfortable it’s like you’re not even wearing a bar. Great comfort and nipple coverage provided with their padding. Very smooth easy to wash and durable. I bought an expensive Bali bra and it deteriorated in the wash and dryer. This I’ve washed and dried multiple times and still good as new! Love it. I will definitely be buying another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this so bad. First impression I thought I discovered something amazing. Unnoticeable and incredibly soft. I washed it in a nice bra garment back meant to to keep everything in tact but every single wash the pad would come out. So I ended up tossing them after a few washes. They’re thin anyway. I didn’t let that change my opinion but what did was that any time I wear it my boobs come out (mind you I’m a small b). They spill out for now reason and I find myself fixing it throughout the day :/
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Pecina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but some minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable overall. Fabric is lightweight and stretchy. Some minor issues - if you have a bit of a belly, the band on the bottom will roll up, especially when sitting down. I also didn't appreciate the huge tag inside that I had to cut out. The pads also tend to move around a bit. I definitely wouldn't pay full price for this item, but I got it on sale for $21, which I think is a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Comfiest T-shirt bra! This will most likely not be worn outside of the house for me as it doesn’t provide much support for my girls (36DD) but gosh darn it I am in love with this thing. I will be ordering a few more just to lounge in, especially being in quarantine still, this was exactly what I needed. It really feels like you’re not wearing a bra but lifts everything up a bit and makes me feel like less of a slob.
customer_reviews.author: Allie D

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for big boobs and no more back bulge
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable bra! Im a 36DD and got the Large. Fits well and have worn a few days and has held its size without stretching out. Also is amazing for smoothing back and you will have ZERO back buldge. 10/10 on this one...ill be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Comfy Soft 💗
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going for comfort, this is it. So comfy I’ve been wearing this to bed, on lounge days and for errand outings during the pandemic. Great for daily walks and yoga too. I don’t run or do high activity in this as there’s hardly any support. Super stretchy, comfy, and soft. Seamless and no lines. Loving this bra so much I already bought two more in other colors. I keep wanting to wear these bras only that all my other ones suddenly seem unappealing. Easy to wash, still looks new after multiple washes. Would trade most of my bra collection for these. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: G. Gables

customer_reviews.title: It's not white...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 1 star because I was under the impression that I was ordering a white bra. "Nymph thigh" tells me absolutely nothing about the color and the picture looks like it's white. I'm very upset about this, I really want one of these in white.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, feels like wearing nothing almost.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sleep/lounge bra for me. I purchased a large and maybe could’ve gotten away with a medium. I have a larger bust size(36G) but am small in frame so according to the size chart a large is what was best for me. It’s really easy to put on, and to adjust. I would like more of a lift but don’t think that is much of the bras’s fault. I will definitely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: KourtNic

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feel.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and feel! True to size. Not a lot of padding but just enough.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bralette
customer_reviews.text: I love to go braless but my breast are too large so I have to have some form of support (38D). I was looking for a comfortable bralette that wouldn't give me neck pain, but was also comfortable to wear. I bought the XL. This is definitely higher quality so I'm willing to pay more than a standard bralette. I also appreciate the adjustable straps. The only down side, is the cup inserts come out WAY too easy. The gap in the sides to remove them is too large and I have lost both of them in my washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Great bralette for DD or smaller
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 32DDD, 5' tall, 35-27-35, I ordered a small, and the band fits perfectly. The only drawback is the cups are not quite big enough for me, so there is some spillage at the top. The True&Co True Body Lift full cup XS fits me better in that respect. But overall this bralette is great, the fabric is double layered, and feels slightly sturdier than the True&Co. The straps can be crossed which is also a plus. Probably fits best up to a D or DD cup.
customer_reviews.author: hethrncole

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bra. Very soft and comfortable. I did buy to wear to work, but I move around a lot and it would ride up. Overall, it's very comfortable and will wear it for every day rather than to work. *I originally gave the spa 5 stars, but I had to knock it down to four. I find that it just is not as supportive as I would have hoped. Back stays in place with the front kind of rides up. There is the need for adjustment periodically. Not all I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Nestle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BRA!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bra I've ever owned that you forget that you have on! I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: leigh olden

customer_reviews.title: BEST BRA EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST bra I’ve ever worn. I’m currently breast feeding and bought it to wear under shirts that typically show my nursing clips. I’ll definitely be ordering more! It’s super comfy, doesn’t show a line through thinner shirts, doesn’t dig in or roll at the edges. I’m typically a 34B, and while nursing range from a B to full C throughout the day and this bra’s stretchiness adjusts perfectly and I’m sure I’ll be able to continue wearing them even once I’m done nursing which is a huge plus! My only complaint is the inserts fall out every time it’s washed, but washing it in a little laundry sack solves that!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Runs a little small so order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it during a deal day and its amazing! Super comfy and colors are beautiful. However I normally wear Size S, but Ordered M just in case and it fits just fine. My true size would be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Simon

customer_reviews.title: summer must have
customer_reviews.text: this bra is frickin amazing. It feels like im wearing nothing at all! Great support considering there is no underwire and I love that I can remove the pads because due to nursing I have a full cup size difference between boobs. So when I remove the right cup and leave the left in it looks completely natural and as if I have 2 boobs that are the same size! This saved my summer! 🤣😂🤣 I bought it in black too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The worst ever
customer_reviews.text: I wore this once. It rode up - and down - in all the wrong places (I am a B-C cup, not huge). It could not have given me a worse shape - or zero shape - if I'd worn a wooden board across my chest. Sadly, I cannot return because I've already worn it. Upside - the cup inserts are pretty good, and I used them on another fabulously comfortable sports bra.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin
customer_reviews.text: Too thin for my taste. Removable cup pads not secured and move around.
customer_reviews.author: Osterbergs

customer_reviews.title: Wow, stretchy and SO comfy
customer_reviews.text: I followed the size guide and was skeptical when it recommended an XS when I usually wear a small in bras. I took the leap and ordered it in an XS anyway. Initially taking it out of the package I didn’t think it was going to fit. I tried it on and WOW it stretched and it doesn’t restrict. It’s places so nicely without any back skin popping out. I need this in every color. My new fave!
customer_reviews.author: CunningJ

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the most comfortable bras I've ever purchased. The material feels like a second skin. In light of COVID I'm not going outside too much and just need something soft and comfortable to give me a little support without feeling restrictive. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JItz2015

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable bra I've ever worn! Great to wear for lounging around, sleep, low activity days!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size 34c-d, and ordered this bra size small. It's beautiful, breathable, and comfortable as the pads are thin which I like. The problem is that it cannot cover my nipples. The coverage is too small while the band width is a little snugg but well fit. I guess I have to order size medium instead. I ordered the medium and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite everyday bra
customer_reviews.text: This bra is the most comfortable bra I have ever had. You can change the straps to cross on the back which is a must for someone like me who has extremely sloped shoulders which cause straps to slip off no matter what. I would recommend washing this is a laundry mesh bag due to the fabric and removal pads. The pads are thin and really only for concealing nips.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Downs

customer_reviews.title: I am buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It’s very comfortable and soft. Great to wear at home and enough support to wear out and about. Removable inserts for added shape. I often prefer wearing medium support sports bras on the weekends. This is a nicer, more flattering alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these bras! Criss cross back option is wonderful too!
customer_reviews.text: These are so outrageously comfortable, I now own 4! Also you have the option for the straps to be straight in the back or you can do criss cross which is comfortable and helps them stay on. The fabric is soft, stretchy and comfortable too. I find these are more comfortable without the removable pads as those dug in to my armpits a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chiaradia

customer_reviews.title: 38DDD - XL: comfy and fits great, not supportive
customer_reviews.text: I am a 38DDD and ordered an XL. I think the fabric is amazing, so silky and soft! Is there support? Not much. I don’t even think that if I went to an XXL there would be more support, just more fabric. I will say the band is stretchy enough to where I could have fit a L but the girls would have been spilling out. It is great for around the house and maybe an errand or two! Or even under a sweatshirt where you don’t need support or shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Bra! Supportive and flattering.
customer_reviews.text: This bra is supportive because the straps are adjustable and it is flattering because it has more of a "v" so it doesn't give you shelf breasts. It has thin pads you can leave in or take out. I take them out because I don't want more volume, but if you have a thin shirt and want to have more coverage, you can leave the pads in and they don't add too much. It is my new favorite bra! I bought the nymph color which is pretty pink and went back and bought the black and white.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so silky soft and is incredibly comfortable. Minimal lines; even under thin fabrics. It stays put and doesn't curl or ride up. It was very easy for me to take the pads out as I don't care for padded bras. I'm really happy with this purchase. It came packaged well within the time frame. I didn't receive any discounts for my review.
customer_reviews.author: CTinCT

customer_reviews.title: A wonder alternative
customer_reviews.text: I love these Calvin’s they fit great, they hug your chest. They are really soft. I usually wear a medium on shirts and this is perfect. It is stretchy and comfy. I am a 34B and the medium worked.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.C

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate wearing a bra. HATE! However, like many women working in a professional environment, going bra-less is not an option. lol So, I found this one and I am super happy. It's a V-neck so it works with any type of blouse. It's comfortable to wear all day and I do not want to completely tear it off and burn it when I get home from my 8-5 (or 6...7).
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable bralette!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the most comfortable bralette I’ve ever worn, feels like butter. It has a great stretch to it, and perfect to wear around the house while working from home during the quarantine. I go out of the house with it on, but if I want more support or shape I would put another on for a cute going out outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & support!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy but still offers just the right amount of support! I bought 2 - on sale & went to order some different colors but sadly the sale was over! I will be watching for the next sale!! Love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and have been wearing on Calvin Klein bras for years due to comfort. I was wearing underwire but can no longer tolerate. These are not as flattering or provide as much padding as their thicker padded under wires, but oh so comfortable. I sized up for utmost comfort and it’s actually perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MoTx

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bralette for myself. It was so soft and comfortable, I purchased one for my daughter, as well. In addition to being one of the most comfortable bralettes I own, I love that it is also easily convertible.
customer_reviews.author: Christy P

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I had to review this amazing bra. This is the most comfortable bra I have ever worn!!! It is light, gives great coverage with a little lift. It’s super soft and the straps don’t dig into your shoulders like a lot of bras do. I am ordering 3 more of these in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin B.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My absolute new favorite bra. I am a bra size 34a and now prefer lightly padded wireless bralettes over underwires and thick padding. This bra is satin soft and super lightweight. I bought one and am going back for more in any color I can get in my size. PS: I got the small and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaCC

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable bralette I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is super comfy and stretchy. I ordered a large but took the foam cups out because they were too small for me. Without the foam cups can't even tell they're missing and no issues with the bralette at all. I wear this under t-shirts and it's fine for when I leave the house. Very comfy and supportive for a bralette. I'm a bustier woman and I am pleased with this product. I highly recommend it to anyone that wants some support, but comfort as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bra! It’s soft to the touch, smooth on the edges and fits perfectly. I can’t stand real bras with the padding and wiring underneath so I tend to lean towards bralettes. This is the perfect blend of both- bra look but bralette type of feel/hold. Only reason I didn’t give it a 5 out of 5 is because I can see the padding through the overal material. I had to take it out so I couldn’t see them through my white shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Sowden

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: These bras are AWESOME! Im so happy. comfortable for got i had it on. No fat pinching or hanging. Im 5'3 160lbs and Im a 34 B...I purchased Med size
customer_reviews.author: Reed's

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is the real deal. The fabric is very see through so when the bra is on, all you see is the color of the inserts popping through the top layer. It's not appealing at all!
customer_reviews.author: AHoo

customer_reviews.title: Wow, price doubled
customer_reviews.text: I actually found this comfortable and was going to buy an additional one, but after less than a week of when I first purchased it for 21.60, the price is now 40?! Crazy. Not buying or recommending.
customer_reviews.author: Vesna Bejdic

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Comfortable soft. Attractive. Good value
customer_reviews.text: Best bra EVER. This must be my 4th order with this type of bra. Finally found a winner ! I am a 42 B and ordered XL. it is a perfect fit, So comfortable, soft and love the adjustable straps. I usually have to return these type bras bc they are too tight.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: At first it was comfy and great. After now less than two months, hand washing only, it’s so stretched out I can’t wear it. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a knock off.... Not Calvin Klein
customer_reviews.text: This feels CHEAP! Too stretchy. The material is soft and breathable... that’s why I gave comfort 3 stars. It feels like you’re not wearing anything at all. But, there is ZERO support.... so you might as well not wear anything at all! Runs BIG! I’m a 38 DD and the fit, per the sizing chart, is wrong. Also, I don’t feel like this is really Calvin Klein. It is so sheer, that you can see the entire inserts and then some (made my husband laugh). I purchased two other similar bras, by a different maker, and they fit and support 10x’s better for half the cost. I am super disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, lightweight Teeshirt Bra
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. It feels like you’re not even wearing one. Perfect tee shirt bra. Definitely have to wash delicate, and the inserts can come out, but are easy to put back in. Overall, for the price and comfort I would but again. It’s my go-to summer bra.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Ibsen

customer_reviews.title: Like clouds. For our tatas
customer_reviews.text: Like a cloud. It doesn't feel like I have any bra on while wearing this bra. I want 80 million more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda2119

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING and SO comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I thought this bra looked super comfortable but it blew my expectations away. SUPER SOFT, comfortable, and you barely know you're wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: cbowman

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I did not give this a 4 because the pads have indentions in them but overall this is one of the most comfortable bras ever. It is light and doesn't cut into my skin at all. I am a 36 A and purchased a medium and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Man

customer_reviews.title: Super comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the scoop neck but i like this better, fits lower under the arm so better fit. So silky you will forget you have this one! Treat yourself...you will never go back to underwire again!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K

customer_reviews.title: Zero support, so very unflattering even on a small chest
customer_reviews.text: I understand 'no wire' but as someone who's smaller chested I would have still expected some support. There's none, which causes this to be super unflattering. I didn't notice right away (again because I don't really need much support, I wear bralettes all the time) until I put a shirt on, how really low my boobs were because there's no support at all! Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: SSchurr

customer_reviews.title: No support and too loose
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy an extra large, I’m a 38D but it is very loose under the breast
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: 34DDD and this fit me. Perfect bra for lounging around but I wear it to work all the time under my scrubs!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: If you're a medium order a large.
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort and stretch but the medium which usually fits me was too small and caused spillage. After I took the lightly padded inserts out the item fit a little better. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl S. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bra is so comfortable! Seems very flattering. I like that it is smoothing there are no rolls on the sides or back. I’m curious to see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviews said, why would it have an irritated tag inside. Otherwise it is soft & comfortable. Returned it, since it is not as comfortable and flattering as True & Co bra I had.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I feel good!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable fit for my body I’ve ever experienced. I love the feel of the material on my body and you will too.
customer_reviews.author: ElderD

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & Barely There
customer_reviews.text: Became an instant favorite. I’m not a fan of underwire but I want an elevated feel when not wearing sports bras. This color is gorgeous - great under white or black. No visible lines and easily wear for 10-12 hours. I’ve actually forgotten and slept in it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it would fit better if I weren't overweight...
customer_reviews.text: This just isn't comfortable and seems like it's too small around my chest area despite choosing the right size per the chart. It's the second type of bralette I've tried from CK and neither one have fit very well at all. I think if I were not overweight it would fit better but I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Twink

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made... didn’t hold up well to washing. No support at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Anne

customer_reviews.title: Seamless And Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very seamless, wide band, thin edges for discreet wear under shirts. I LOVE IT! It’s so soft and the straps stay out of the way of low neck shirts. Very comparable to my Soma bra, except this bra stays hidden more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. So comfy! The perfect bra during these COVID times where you don’t want to wear anything. This is so comfortable, I forgot I had it on.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Bubbs

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Bra
customer_reviews.text: I’m very small and often find it hard to purchase normal bras. These fit like a bralette (no hooks, goes over your head) but have normal bra straps. My new favorite bras 💕
customer_reviews.author: Mme

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Comfortable Bra.
customer_reviews.text: The best Perfect comfy bra ever! I bought it because I am pregnant and can’t wear with wired push up bra anymore. And It is incredibly comfortable. I can even sleep with this bra. Eye opening for new world.
customer_reviews.author: Min Yi

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: This bra is a must for wearing under t-shirts or thin knits. Not a line to be seen! Totally smooth and comfortable. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and very comfortable. If you can’t wear an underwear bra or have shoulder issues, this is the best bra I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: C-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best fricken bra ever!!! Little pricey. So comfortable. 32 c my Size and it doesn't ride up and smooth and invisible as described. Definelty buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with original Calvin Klein removable pads
customer_reviews.text: I ordered many of these bralettes in other colors and they were perfect but this black one came with some cheap replacement pads instead of the original Calvin Klein removable pads. The cheaply made ones are hard, poorly shaped, and do not fit the silhouette of the bralette.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Calvin Klein bras. Pull over, no falling straps, no closures to deal with, just pull on and go, super light fabric. I wIll definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: karendillingham

customer_reviews.title: A little big but wonderful bra!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bras!!!! I bought them first at Macy’s during Christmas & then on Amazon Deal of the day! They are great!!! Runs a little big
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: oh my gosh! i am someone who hates underwire and back clips, i was gifted with pretty large boobs and i just have always found regular bras uncomfortable! I have been wearing a nike sports bra as my bra for YEARS! I ordered this and let me tell you, it feels like BUTTER and it’s so flattering compared to my sports bra. it’s lifting in all the right places and feels like you’re not even wearing a bra! obsessed! just ordered another color!
customer_reviews.author: Phelicia R.

customer_reviews.title: The bra of my dreams
customer_reviews.text: I no longer wear wired bras and finding bralletes or wireless bras that are flattering is not easy. I’m so happy with this one! The fabric is so soft and nice you even forget you’re wearing a bra! It also comes with pads that you can easily remove. I’m planning on getting more of these, they’re amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria T

customer_reviews.title: 👎
customer_reviews.text: You can see the light padding through the bra and it looks cheap, surprised it's Calvin Klein. Frankly expected better, higher standards. If you are going for comfort, great - but looks, nope.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dewald

customer_reviews.title: so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: this is the most comfortable bra i ever wore in my life. Looks great under t shirts and feels like nothing! washes well too.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bra is so comfortable because it lacks the hook and eye closure of regular bras. I could wear this one all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Your new perfect bra!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bra! So comfy, feels like you are not wearing a bra. Very comfy fabric, perfect stretch. Perfect coverage. In love!
customer_reviews.author: Olga P.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a t-shirt
customer_reviews.text: Feels like I’m not even wearing a bra 🙊 they are the most comfortable and pretty little thing you will wear.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This fits well and is comfortable. You need to reposition liber each time you put it on but I like it
customer_reviews.author: Theglassdiva

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36B and a medium fits me perfectly. The straps are adjustable and the fabric is so soft. I appreciate the light lining and like to keep the inserts in, but they seem to easily slip out of the sides. Not that big of a deal but I wish they were sewn in.
customer_reviews.author: Lanni Aquila

customer_reviews.title: Label inside says large, definitely not large!
customer_reviews.text: I have a calvin klein large sports bra that fits fine for years, I ordered a Mae Amazon large that fits fine, this is not large and was mismarked!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: So soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Soft and smooth material that is truly seamless under clothes. Removable cups. So comfortable that you forget that you’re wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no support
customer_reviews.text: This was such a waste of money. I wear a 38 DD and went according to their size chart but the bra has no support and fits too loose. It is comfortable enough to fall asleep in kind of bra....lol!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Flattering & Comfy Bra
customer_reviews.text: It's a Flattering Bra. It fits perfect. I just don't know how to put the cups back after washing it.
customer_reviews.author: cyndi markis

customer_reviews.title: Nicest bra
customer_reviews.text: Nicest bra i ever had I"m gonna buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: super comfy
customer_reviews.text: love it, gonna buy more. super comfy, does have padding. Do happy with purchase, true to size
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Best bra
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. This is the second one I’ve purchased. The most comfortable and supportive bras I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nymphs thigh is PINK - not white
customer_reviews.text: The XL fits my DD perfect. Was surprised when the “Nymph’s Thigh” color showed up and it is PINK! The picture on here makes it look more white, but it is a legit baby pink. FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even feel like I'm wearing a bra.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley love the feel of the fabric and fits great...doesn't lift as much as I would like, but feels super comfortable. Hope it holds up after a few washes. Will wash by hand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Llorens

customer_reviews.title: Buy without hesitation!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! So so comfortable. Doesn’t put as much pressure on your chest under your breasts as others. I’m immediately buying 4 more and plan to live in these. Highly recommend. I’m a plus size gal, size 16/18 and 38B, and I got the XL.
customer_reviews.author: Keytra

customer_reviews.title: Soft!!
customer_reviews.text: This bralette is soft, has great support, and has easy to remove pads. I am a 36C and ordered the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Lolocf

customer_reviews.title: So Soft! Love
customer_reviews.text: I love the invisibles line! This is so soft and fits well. A bit pricey, but the quality is worth it. I am a 34B and I got a small.
customer_reviews.author: Mckenzie Minnis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great around the house bra! Exactly what I ordered it for. I wear a 34DD and got a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE!! 😊
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable bra I have EVER worn!!! I almost forgot I was wearing it. 🤭😊😂 BEST KEPT SECRET EVER!! 😁 **I was NOT paid for this review**
customer_reviews.author: Drea

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Women's Invisibles Wirefree Lightly Lined Triangle Bralette
product_meta.description: With a seamless finish and flexible fit, This Calvin Klein underwear Invisibles lightly lined bralette is crafted from smooth microfiber stretch. Designed with a v-neckline front, adjustable straps for a custom fit, Removable pads for added versatility, compact logo detailing and clean cut edges for invisible wear under clothing.
feature_bullets: Lightly lined bralette silhouette and solid design
Smooth, flexible microfiber and clean cut edges, invisible under clothing
V-neck, adjustable straps, removable pads and heat seal logo
Complete the set with a CK invisibles hipster
